info.readme:
Blogging built on Umbraco
Supporting all the features you'd want in a blogging platform:
* Categories & Tags * Themes * Live Writer support * Markdown support * Easily post from your mobile phone including adding images and photos direct from you camera * Disqus, Google+ or Facebook comment support * Search * Blogml import/export ** During import we can also export a compatible XML so you can easily import your comments to Disqus * RSS ** Built in or custom feed ** Feeds per category/tag * Customizable urls * Author profiles

GenericProperty.Name: Custom RSS Feed Url
GenericProperty.Description: Optional custom rss feed URL (i.e. if you use feedburner, etc...)

GenericProperty.Name: Google Analytics Name
GenericProperty.Description: The site name associated with your Google Analytics (i.e. mysite.com )

GenericProperty.Name: Categories Page Name
GenericProperty.Description: The page title for the categories listing

GenericProperty.Name: Tags Page Name
GenericProperty.Description: The page title for the tags listing

GenericProperty.Name: Search Page Name
GenericProperty.Description: The page title for the search results

GenericProperty.Name: Redirect Archive
GenericProperty.Description: If specified this will redirect the Archive blog post container URL to this Articulate blog root

GenericProperty.Name: Use yyyy/mm/dd format for Url
GenericProperty.Description: If specified, this will generate posts' urls in the /yyyy/mm/dd/slug format, ie 2017/06/09/codegarden-rocks

GenericProperty.Name: Extract First Image to Property
GenericProperty.Description: When Windows Live Writer (or compatible WebBlog API tool) is used to create blog posts, with this option enabled it will set the first image found in the blog post to the blog's image property if one is found.

GenericProperty.Name: Umbraco Url Name
GenericProperty.Description: The Umbraco Url Name for this node, this will be the prefix URL for each blog post

GenericProperty.Name: Author Url
GenericProperty.Description: A url to link to the author's website

GenericProperty.Name: Import Id
GenericProperty.Description: Used during a blogml import process to ensure that re-importing does not create duplicate posts.

GenericProperty.Name: Slug
GenericProperty.Description: If left blank then umbraco will auto-generate the URL name based on the node name

GenericProperty.Name: Published Date
GenericProperty.Description: This is the date that the document will be shown as published on your website

GenericProperty.Name: Post Image
GenericProperty.Description: An optional image for your blog post

GenericProperty.Name: Social Description
GenericProperty.Description: Open Graph Description - Describe the article in one or two lines.
